name: tramping
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
tramp
to walk, especially long distances or with heavy steps: to tramp through the woods/undergrowth We spent a week tramping the streets of San Francisco, looking for movie locations. Synonyms
roam (MOVE AROUND)
trudge
